content: In this section, we briefly review the prospects and challenges of permanent human habitation away from Earth.

name: Energy Needs
content: An offworld habitat will have high energy needs, as it will probably require intensive agriculture and energy-intensive recycling of air, water, and material. Furthermore, electrical options such as synthetic fuels must substitute for the lack of fossil fuels. Estimate of energy needs are as follows.
